noAdminMessage: This account doesn't have any admin
noUserMessage: This account doesn't have any regular user

chargeReminder.line1: Your on-file credit card will immediately be charged for any changes you make. If you have changed any recurring services, new charges will be pro-rated for your billing cycle.
chargeReminder.line2: Are you sure you want to continue?

unknown.name: Other than above
unknown.help: Please select this option when you want this account to place calls to ANY NUMBER other than mentioned on the list. (When the format of the number is unknown to the system.)

servicePlanWizardLegend: Choose a service plan for this account:
servicePlanResellerOnly: Only resellers are allowed to manage service plans.
trunksLegend: Set limits for included simultaneous inbound and outbound calls
callRestrictionsTitle: This account can place calls to...
balanceTooltip: This credit will be used to make per-minute (plan) calls, international calls and receive toll-free calls.
allowPrepay: Allow customers to make per-minute calls that go over the above limit, and bill them the per-minute cost of the call

addAdminLink.toggleOn: Add an admin to the account
addAdminLink.toggleOff: I changed my mind, who needs an admin?

wizardErrorMessages.accountMandatoryFields: The account name and realm fields are mandatory.
wizardErrorMessages.adminMandatoryFields: The admin first name, last name and email address are mandatory when adding a new admin.
wizardErrorMessages.adminPasswordError: The password must be at least 6 characters long and include a letter and a number.
wizardErrorMessages.adminPasswordConfirmError: The password and its confirmation do not match.
wizardErrorMessages.incorrectBalanceFormat: Incorrect format for balance credit, you can only enter a number with up to 2 decimals.
wizardErrorMessages.balanceMinimumAmount: The minimum amount for balance credit is $5.00.

wizardProcessingMessage2: Please wait while the account is being created.
deleteUserConfirm: This user will be permanently deleted. Continue?
deleteAccountConfirm: This account will be permanently deleted. Continue?

toastrMessages.servicePlanUpdateError: An unexpected error occurred! Please try again.
toastrMessages.servicePlanReconciliationError: An error occurred during reconciliation process! Please try again later.
toastrMessages.servicePlanSynchronizationError: An error occurred during synchronization process! Please try again later.
toastrMessages.limitsUpdateError: An unexpected error occured when updating the limits, please try again later.
toastrMessages.creditAddSuccess: Credit successfully added to the current balance!
toastrMessages.creditAddError: An unexpected error occured when adding credit, please try again later.
toastrMessages.deleteAccountError: An error occured while deleting the account, please try again.

newAccount.accountError: An unexpected error occured while creating the account.
newAccount.adminError: The account administrator could not be created.
newAccount.limitsError: An error occured while setting up the limits.
newAccount.creditError: An error occured while adding credit to the account.
newAccount.servicePlanError: An error occured while assigning the service plan to the account.

toastrMessages.uiRestrictionsUpdateError: An unexpected error occured when updating the UI restrictions, please try again later.
toastrMessages.notesUpdateError: An unexpected error occured when updating the notes, please try again later.

uiRestrictionsLegend: Select what your customer can view
uiRestrictionsTooltip: When you click on your name from top right corner of the screen, you will see a dropdown menu. You can restrict the view of these options to your Sub-Account by simply uncheck it from account permissions.
notesLegend: Write some notes on this account
